item.title: Counting the Collatz numbers
item.description: arXiv:2512.13760v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: The counting function for the numbers satisfying the Collatz conjecture is studied. A related exponential congruence equation is investigated, yielding a method to construct its solutions from free variables, and enabling us to find at least $x^{0.946}$ Collatz numbers in the interval $[1,x]$. The historical record is 0.84.
item.dc:creator: Chunlei Liu
